methods.name: offer
methods.desc: Creates a merkle tree based atomic payment/xfer group

args.name: root
args.desc: the merkle tree root of trades consisting of from address, recipient address, asset id & amount

args.name: leaves
args.desc: the number of leaves in the tree

args.name: participantsRoot
args.desc: the merkle tree root of participating addresses

args.name: participantLeaves
args.desc: the number of leaves in the participant tree

args.name: expiration
args.desc: the unix timestamp that the offer auto-expires at if it has not been accepted by all participants

args.name: id
args.desc: the id of the offer being accepted

args.name: proof
args.desc: the bytes32 array proof of inclusion in the participants list

methods.name: escrow
methods.desc: Escrows the assets in the trade for a given leaf in the tree

args.name: id
args.desc: the id of the offer

args.name: receiver
args.desc: the recipient in the offer leaf

methods.name: escrowAsa
methods.desc: Escrows the assets in the trade for a given leaf in the tree

args.name: id
args.desc: the id of the offer

args.name: receiver
args.desc: the recipient in the offer leaf

args.name: asset
args.desc: the asset in the offer leaf

args.name: amount
args.desc: the amount in the offer leaf

args.name: proof
args.desc: the proof to verify the details are part of the tree

methods.name: disburse
methods.desc: Disburses assets for a leaf in the tree, ensuring ordered processing

args.name: id
args.desc: the id of the offer

args.name: receiver
args.desc: the recipient abstracted account app id for the address in the leaf

args.name: asset
args.desc: the asset being transferred

args.name: amount
args.desc: the amount being transferred

args.name: id
args.desc: the id of the offer being cancelled

args.name: proof
args.desc: a proof of inclusion in the participants list

methods.name: withdraw
methods.desc: Withdraws your assets from a cancelled swap if they're escrowed

args.name: id
args.desc: the id of the cancelled offer

args.name: receiver
args.desc: the receiver of the leaf's swap

args.name: asset
args.desc: the asset of the leaf's swap

args.name: amount
args.desc: the amount of the leaf's swap

args.name: proof
args.desc: the proof that the leaf is in the tree
